item.title: Google Summer of Code 2024 - 'Multigrid for FEniCSx'
item.description: Intro This is the report on the Google Summer of Code 2024 project ‘Multigrid for FEniCSx’, under the auspecies of the NumFOCUS organization, on the FEniCS Project, which is (since 2016) fiscally supported by NumFOCUS. The FEniCS project’s main component is the finite element solving environment DOLFINx on which most of the projects work was spent working on. The ‘x’, here indicates the new version, in comparison to the former (now legacy) DOLFIN.
